Una clínica dental pensada per a tu: A dental clinic designed for you
Clínica Barroso posa a disposició un equ: Clínica Barroso provides a multidisciplinary team of experts in orthodontics and pediatric dentistry, implantology and oral rehabilitation, dental aesthetics, endodontics and periodontics with the most up-to-date knowledge to make your experience the best possible.
Cada cas serà tractat de manera individu: Each case will be treated individually, looking for a “tailor-made” treatment for each particular situation.
Somriure és un acte instintiu, natural i: Smiling is an instinctive, natural and even beneficial act for health.
Especialistes en ortodòncia, implants i: Specialists in orthodontics, implants and aesthetics
Som una clínica dental amb una llarga tr:
We are a dental clinic with a long family tradition, located in Girona since 1949.

The multidisciplinary team of specialized dentists formed mostly for university professors is led by the third generation of dentists of the Barroso family. The self-demand and commitment in each treatment, and the trust placed by thousands of patients during more than 70 years of activity, makes it a dental clinic of reference in Girona.
És l'especialitat que té com a finalitat: It is the specialty that aims to correct the position of the teeth and control the growth of the jaws with the aim of not only achieving correct dental alignment, but also restoring the functional balance of the mouth and improve facial harmony.
Abans d'iniciar el tractament ortodòntic: Before starting the orthodontic treatment, we carry out a study of the patient's functional, dental and aesthetic problems. The orthodontic study is essential to be able to offer the best individualized treatment plan. The orthodontist must devote time and resources to analyze each case and obtain a complete diagnosis. The registers we use are:
- Fotografies frontal i de perfil (en re: - Frontal and profile photos (at rest and natural smile)
- Models digitals de la boca realizats a: - Digital models of the mouth made with the intraoral scanner
- Dues radiografies: l'ortopantomografia: - Two x-rays: orthopantomography and lateral skull x-ray
- Proves complementàries com el TAC dent: - Complementary tests such as the dental TAC according to the case
L'ortodòncia invisible és un sistema d'o:
Invisible orthodontics is an aesthetic orthodontic system for those people who need to align their teeth, but who for personal or professional reasons want their appliances to be invisible. For this, a sequence of transparent aligners are used that gradually correct the position of the teeth. A big advantage is that you can take them off to eat or brush your teeth, which offers greater comfort and hygiene.

The aligners are manufactured individually for each patient based on digital planning carried out by Dr. Cristina Barroso.
Quan recomanem realitzar la primera visi: When do we recommend making the first visit with the orthodontist?
Recomanem la primera visita amb l'ortodo: We recommend the first visit with the orthodontist around the age of 6. At this age and even earlier we can detect bad habits such as mouth breathing, finger and pacifier sucking, bad placement of the tongue... Early diagnosis will prevent future problems in the growth of the jaws.
Els grans avantatges de l'ortodòncia inf: The great advantages of children's orthodontics are:
· Millorar la malposició de les dents ev: · Improve the malposition of the teeth by avoiding more complex and longer treatments in the future
· Afavorir un correcte creixement simètr: · Promote a correct symmetrical growth of the maxilla
· Millorar la respiració del nen/a en el: · Improve the child's breathing in cases where we perform an expansion of the palate
· Millorar múltiples funcions com són la: · Improve multiple functions such as speech and mastication
<b>Cas 1.</b> Abans-després d'un tractam: Case 1. Before-after a palate expansion treatment performed on a 7-year-old girl.
<b>Cas 2.</b> Abans-després d'un tractam: Case 2. Before-after a palate expansion treatment performed on a 8-year-old boy.
Una altra opció per alinear les dents és: Another option for aligning the teeth is using the braces. There are several types of braces:
· Els brackets tradicionals: utilitzen g: · Traditional braces: use rubbers to hold the arches
· Els brackets d'autolligat Damon: no ne: · Damon self-ligating braces: they don't need rubbers to hold the arches
A Clínica Barroso utilitzem els brackets: At Clínica Barroso we use Damon braces because they offer us a number of advantages over traditional braces. Using a high-quality bracket and technology allows us to:
· Una millora de l'estètica facial al cr: · An improvement in facial aesthetics by creating a wider smile
· Més comoditat pel pacient al produir-s: · Greater comfort for the patient as smoother movements of the teeth occur. The forces are less noticeable
· Disminució de l'acumulació de bactèrie: · Decrease in the accumulation of bacteria by not wearing rubber bands around the braces, and consequently better dental hygiene
<b>Cas 3.</b> Abans-després d'un tractam: Case 3. Before-after an orthodontic treatment performed with Damon braces
L'oclusió és la correcta relació entre l: Occlusion is the correct relationship between the upper and lower teeth. Some functions such as speech and chewing can be affected due to a malocclusion.
De vegades per solucionar determinades m: Sometimes to solve certain malocclusions it is necessary to use more complex techniques and therefore specific knowledge about this type of treatment. One of these techniques is the use of miniscrews. These are small fixations that we place temporarily in the maxillary and mandibular bones. Its function is to generate additional forces in order to achieve more precise movements of the teeth.
És la modalitat d'ortodòncia pels pacien: It is the orthodontic modality for adult patients who have already finished growing and who present a severe malocclusion where the position of the maxillary bones must be modified.
Amb l'ortodòncia primer posicionem corre: With orthodontics, we first position the teeth correctly in the maxilla and jaw, and then with surgery, the bones are placed correctly in order to achieve a good gearing of the teeth, in addition to improving aesthetics facial and masticatory function.
La periodòncia és l'especialitat de l'od: Periodontics is the specialty of dentistry that diagnoses and treats problems with the tissues that support the teeth (gums). The main periodontal diseases are gingivitis and periodontitis. Gingivitis consists of the inflammation and bleeding of the gum without affecting the bone. When the bone that supports the tooth begins to be destroyed by a bacterial process, we are talking about periodontitis.
Procés de la malaltia periodontal amb in: Periodontal disease process with gingival inflammation and alveolar bone destruction.
El tractament de la malaltia periodontal: The treatment of periodontal disease consists of adequate professional hygiene, with the use of ultrasound and scraping with periodontal curettes. It will also be very important if it is necessary to correct the techniques of daily oral hygiene maintenance by the patient.
Recuperació parcial de l'os perdut al vo: Partial recovery of lost bone around a tooth with periodontal disease.
En aquesta especialitat també s'inclouen: Mucogingival plastic surgery techniques are also included in this specialty. These are surgical techniques that correct defects in the gum that surrounds the tooth. Mucogingival microsurgery techniques will be used to improve the quality and position of the affected gums.
Recuperació de quantitat de teixit gingi: Recovery of gingival tissue quantity in a case of  multiple recessions by doing gingival grafts.
Millora de la qualitat i quantitat de ge: Improvement of the quality and quantity of gum in the two lower incisors.
Els implants dentals han revolucionat l': Dental implants have revolutionized dentistry in the last 40 years, improving the quality of life for many people. They allow the foundations to be created to replace the original teeth and for the new ones to look, feel and function like natural teeth.
Les persones que han perdut dents, poden: People who have lost teeth can, thanks to implants, eat anything, knowing that the natural appearance of their mouth is maintained and that facial aesthetics are preserved.
Els implants dentals són petits aditamen: Dental implants are small additions with external and internal threads, made of a titanium alloy. Titanium is a biocompatible metal, its main characteristic is the capacity for osseointegration with the tissues, that is, the direct union with the bone once placed. This biological process takes between 2 and 3 months under normal conditions. It will thus become a solid anchor on which the dental prosthesis, in other words, the tooth, can later be fixed.
La col.locació de l'implant dental és l': The placement of the dental implant is the only way to avoid the atrophic degeneration that occurs in the bone once the tooth has been extracted. At Clínica Barroso we will always look for the treatment alternative that allows us to minimize the invasiveness of the procedure and at the same time achieve the best possible result.
La cirurgia mínimament invasiva consiste: Minimally invasive surgery consists of performing surgery (placement of dental implants, bone or gum grafts, extractions, etc.) with minimal manipulation of the tissues, reducing the extent of the incisions or even performing surgeries without the use of a scalpel.
Quins beneficis té la cirurgia mínimamen: What are the benefits of minimally invasive surgery?
Principalment tenir un postoperatori més: Mainly to have a milder postoperative period, with less inflammation, bruising and less discomfort associated with tissue healing. In addition, by taking more care in handling the tissues, it is more difficult to have post-operative complications such as infections or bleeding. In many cases, the implementation of this type of technique also leads to significantly reducing the total treatment times, reducing the number of visits to carry out the treatment.
Col.locació d'implant dental en incisiu: Dental implant placement in the upper central incisor without the use of a scalpel.
En algunes ocasions es podrà realitzar l: In some cases, it will be possible to place the implant on the same day as the tooth extraction, thus reducing the number of interventions. Advances in the macro design of implants will allow us to put the dental prosthesis on the implant on the same day, thus providing a fixed temporary prosthesis from the moment the tooth is removed, solving the aesthetic problem in a single day. It is what is called immediate loading or immediate aesthetics.
A Clínica Barroso som especialistes en t: At Clínica Barroso we are specialists in minimally invasive surgery techniques. Dr Albert Barroso has carried out different research studies on these types of techniques. He has focused part of his time on research work on immediate implantology. These techniques allow us to place the implants without using the scalpel, and therefore, without the need for stitches. By handling less tissue, post-operative inflammation and associated discomfort are much less. Thus, in a single operation, we can replace the defective tooth with a new (provisional) fixed one, maintaining the aesthetics at all times and avoiding the use of inconvenient removal and insertion devices. In one of the scientific publications of Dr. Albert Barroso notes that patient satisfaction is much higher with the implementation of this type of protocol in dental implantology***.
Substitució de dent fracturada per un im: Replacement of a fractured tooth with a dental implant. Clinical appearance after 5 years.
La pròtesi dental substitueix les estruc: The dental prosthesis replaces lost or damaged dental structures, returning to the mouth all the functionality, resistance and aesthetics of the original pieces.
Les pròtesis encaminades a solucionar pr: The prostheses aimed at solving aesthetic problems are dental veneers.
Són fines làmines col.locades a la part: They are thin plates placed on the front or front of each tooth. We use them to change and improve different aspects such as color, shape or position. Therefore, they will require much less preparation of the tooth compared to covers or crowns.
Hi ha diferents tipus de facetes a valor: There are different types of veneers to be assessed by the specialist, but we could divide them, according to the material, into two: ceramic dental veneers and composite or resin veneers.
Les facetes ceràmiques es fabriquen amb: Ceramic veneers are manufactured using indirect techniques (for a laboratory technician) and will give a superior result to resin veneers in terms of aesthetics and durability.
Què podem camuflar amb les facetes denta: What can we camouflage with dental veneers?
Modificació del color i la forma de les: Modification of the color and shape of the anterior teeth with ceramic dental veneers.
En casos en què l'objectiu apart de l'es: In cases where the objective, apart from aesthetics, is to recover the lost function, there are multiple alternatives of materials and designs aimed at providing the best solution to the needs of each patient.
La pròtesi no només ens permetrà recuper: The prosthesis will not only allow us to recover the lost functionality but it can also provide a rejuvenation of the expression of the smile.
Rehabilitació oral total amb fundes sobr: Total oral rehabilitation with crowns on worn teeth.
Recanvi de corona antiga fracturada. Es: Replacement of old fractured crown. Maximum resistance is sought with the new materials and maximum mimicry with the rest of the teeth.
Quan parlem de dentadures suportades sob: When we talk about dentures supported on dental implants we can make different types of prostheses, in terms of features (fixed / removable) and in terms of materials (ceramic or resin). Each patient will be subjected to a meticulous study to assess which type of prosthesis is most suitable according to the conditions they present.
Dentadures totals fixes sobre implants d: Fixed full dentures on dental implants.
L'endodòncia és la part de l'odontologia: Endodontics is the part of dentistry that deals with the diagnosis and treatment of diseases of the teeth that affect the dental pulp (the nerve). When decay attacks the tooth, it gradually holes it. The enamel is damaged first. If it continues to progress, it affects the dentin, and if it progresses further, it reaches the pulp where the nerve is located.
Les càries solen avançar lentament pel q: Cavities usually progress slowly, so it's easy to spot them before they get too big. Many times they are discovered by means of an X-ray. They don't always hurt. Sometimes pain is not felt until it has reached the nerve. When the decay reaches the nerve, it becomes infected and therefore becomes inflamed and painful. If the inflammation persists, the nerve may lose its vitality. Pain is no longer felt, but pus is produced, which comes out through the tip of the root, and causes phlegmon. When the decay reaches the nerve, endodontics must be performed, which consists of opening a cavity in the tooth and removing the nerve that has been affected by the decay.
Després de la seva desinfecció, que és f: After its disinfection, which is essential, the duct is filled with a sealing material. This whole process is very delicate and meticulous, and its complexity depends on the morphology of the roots.
Desaparició de l'infecció després de rea: Disappearance of the infection after performing endodontics.
Quan recomanem la primera visita amb l'o: When do we recommend the first visit with the pediatric dentist?
Recomanem la primera visita al voltant d: We recommend the first visit around one year of age, when the first milk teeth have already erupted. During this first visit, we give guidelines to parents on how to maintain good oral health and hygiene of the baby's teeth. It is very important to carry out periodic checks in order to prevent caries or other pathologies in the future. In this way we also achieve a routine so that the child becomes familiar with us and loses the anxiety of coming to the dentist.
Quins tipus de tractaments són els més f: What types of treatments are the most common?
La diferència entre l'odontologia en adu: The difference between adult dentistry and pediatric dentistry is that children's cavities are treated in baby teeth instead of permanent teeth. The permanent teeth are formed under the roots of the baby teeth and any infection in the baby tooth can affect the permanent one. Caries removal involves removing the affected tooth structure and filling the defect with a white resin material.
És l'eliminació de la part de nervi afec: It is the removal of the part of the affected nerve in cases where the decay is very deep and has affected the dental nerve. It is then replaced by a biocompatible material.
Es tracta de reparar amb un material de: It is about repairing with a white resin material fractured teeth due to falls, impacts or blows.
Consisteix en aplicar fluor a les dents: It consists of applying fluoride to the teeth in order to increase the strength of the enamel and remineralize it. The application of fluoride periodically helps to prevent the appearance of caries.
És possible la pèrdua d'una dent de llet: It is possible to lose a baby tooth prematurely or that its extraction is necessary. In these cases, a space maintainer is usually used to save the resulting space, with the aim that the permanent tooth can grow properly in its place.
Serveixen per protegir les dents dels ne: They serve to protect the teeth of boys and girls who carry out sporting activities at risk of suffering any type of dental trauma.
Anar al dentista pot suposar una experiè: Going to the dentist can be an unpleasant experience for many people. We attach great importance to you being able to feel comfortable, relaxed and confident throughout the treatment. We are specialists in minimally invasive techniques, which will often improve your experience.
Si desitja contactar amb nosaltres per a: If you wish to contact us for any comment, query or request, we provide you with a contact form so that you can write to us when you need it.
Per què Clínica Barroso és la teva clíni: Why Clínica Barroso is your trusted dental clinic in Girona?
Apostem per a fer tractaments de qualita: We are committed to quality treatments. We do not prioritize the number of treatments performed in the clinic. Professional ethics and the expectations of each patient are our priorities.
L'odontologia digital i el concepte de d: Digital dentistry and the concept of a digital dentist is relatively new. At Clínica Barroso we will use the best technology available as long as it gives us advantages in carrying out the diagnosis and the treatment itself. The digitization of many of the procedures with the use of intraoral scanners, planning software or digital radiology will allow us to perform less invasive treatments, significantly improving the patient experience.
En l'equip de Clínica Barroso comptem am: In the Barroso Clinic team, we have highly specialized professionals in the different branches of dentistry. Apart from great professionals, the patient will be able to check at each visit their human quality and close treatment.
Ubicats al centre de Girona, al barri de: Located in the center of Girona, in the Químics district, where you will have free parking facilities. If you use public transport you can also use the urban bus lines.
Posem a la disposició dels nostres pacie: We make available to our patients various personalized financing alternatives so that the economic factor is not an obstacle when it comes to achieving good health and dental aesthetics.
Missatge enviat correctament! En breu en: Message sent successfully! We will contact you shortly. Thank you

Somriure es un acte instintiu, natural i: Smiling is an instinctive, natural act and even beneficial for health. Today it is one of the most important distinguishing features of humans. In fact, the canons of beauty attach great importance to white and well-placed teeth.
En el disseny d'un somriure és molt impo:
In the design of a smile, it is very important to make a correct diagnosis to achieve the results that best satisfy the patient's expectations. In this diagnostic phase, the patient can also be shown the expected aesthetic result before starting (mock-up test). Once all the necessary information (photographs, radiographs or study models) has been collected, treatment can begin. This may require the involvement of different specialties: orthodontics, surgery, periodontics or prosthetics.

In the design of a smile, an attempt is made to use metal-free materials, to give a more natural look to the rehabilitation, in other words, we try to integrate the smile with the rest of the patient's mouth or face. Ceramic veneers, ceramic crowns, or in more advanced cases aesthetic rehabilitation with implants are used for these purposes.

For more information, doctors from Clínica Barroso will be able to advise you personally.
<strong>Cas 1.</strong> Rehabilitació es: Case 1. Aesthetic rehabilitation with a combination of ceramic veneers, implants and crowns.
<strong>Cas 2.</strong> Correcció del so: Case 2. Correction of inverted smile with ceramic veneers.
<strong>Cas 3.</strong> Tractament d'ort: Case 3. Orthodontic treatment of a patient with severe tooth crowding.
<strong>Cas 4.</strong> Rehabilitació or: Case 4. Total oral rehabilitation with fixed prostheses on dental implants.
Quin és el procés del tractament dental: Which is the dental treatment process at Clínica Barroso?
En presentar-se un problema bucal, un di: When an oral problem occurs, an adequate diagnosis, as well as the correct preparation of a treatment plan, are essential. Making bad decisions in this phase can affect the rest of the treatment.
En la fase de diagnòstic s'analitzaran e: In the diagnostic phase, the aesthetic, functional or biological problems that the patient may present will be analyzed. We place great value on the first visit, as it is the moment when decisions will be made to provide solutions to the problems.
En aquesta visita es prenen els registre: In this visit, the records that are necessary for the proper study of the oral problem are taken: X-rays, records of the dentition or photographs, or even a 3D X-ray if necessary or an intraoral scan. In accordance with these, the treatment options will be offered, which are the most recommended in your case and how long the entire treatment can last.
Després d'aquesta visita es podrà propor: After this visit it will be possible to provide an economic plan of the cost of the treatment and assess the form of payment. Once the patient decides to start, the case will be approached from the different specialties he may need: periodontics and prevention, prosthetics and aesthetics, orthodontics, surgery and implantology, pediatric dentistry or endodontics.
L'objectiu de l'odontologia ha de ser in: The goal of dentistry must be to try to maintain the natural dentition functionally and aesthetically for the entire life of the patient. Therefore, the dentist must be an expert in carrying out the necessary treatments so that the patient can have his teeth in a suitable state throughout his life. This is the task of conservative dentistry, which treats injuries resulting from caries. Meticulousness and precision in these procedures, apart from adequate maintenance by the patient, are the keys to the teeth lasting over time and not deteriorating.
La boca és un espai de difícil accés i v: The mouth is a space with difficult access and visibility, so the use of magnifying glasses with good lighting can help in some cases to achieve higher quality results. Working with magnification will allow us to capture details that the human eye may not perceive. This tool will allow us to work better in aesthetic rehabilitations, as well as to be more precise in certain surgical interventions.
La <b>implantologia i l'ortodòncia</b> s: Implantology and orthodontics are restorative or corrective dentistry specialties. At the same time, they are specialties that often complement each other, thus making what we know as multidisciplinary treatments. The quality of the implants and the designs of the prostheses play an important role in the appearance of both mechanical and biological complications in the medium-long term.
Aquests problemes poden aparèixer en els: These problems can appear in the first moments after finishing the treatment or after the passage of years due to the wear or fatigue of some of the components. These are complications that should be avoided. That is why at Clínica Barroso we only work with brands with the highest recognition, using all original components for the preparation of the teeth.
La <b>periodòncia</b> és l'especialitat: Periodontics is the specialty of dentistry responsible for the prevention and treatment of problems arising from the gums. These problems arise from the accumulation of bacterial plaque and calculus. The treatment of these problems consists of adequate control of the causative factors, and it is highly recommended to perform professional dental hygiene at least once a year.
Té molta importància el control de la ma: The control of periodontal disease is very important, since it affects the supporting tissues of the tooth. Also included in this specialty is the repair of blemishes or gum defects around teeth or implants. These can be corrected with mucogingival microsurgery techniques.
Els doctors Albert i Cristina Barroso, a: Doctors Albert and Cristina Barroso will attend to and listen to the needs of each patient during the first visit. In accordance with these, a planning and treatment proposal will be made in coordination with the rest of the team.
La Doctora Cristina Barroso després d'ac: Dr. Cristina Barroso, after finishing her studies in Dentistry, completed complementary training in periodontics and odontopediatrics, and obtained the specialty in Orthodontics after 3 years of exclusive dedication in the Master of Orthodontics at the University of Barcelona. He currently teaches at the school of hygienists at the Aurea study center and at the Master's in Odontopediatrics at the University of Barcelona. Doctor Albert Barroso, after his Dentistry studies, completed an exclusive training in Oral Surgery, Implants and Prosthetics for two years in Barcelona. He subsequently obtained the title of Doctor of Dentistry “CUM LAUDE” defending a doctoral thesis generated in a clinical study carried out at Clinica Barroso, from which various international scientific publications have been made.*** Currently and since 2007 he teaches at the International University of Catalonia in the Degree in Dentistry, the Master in Oral Surgery and in different continuing education courses and conferences
Reposicionament quirúrgic del marge ging: Surgical repositioning of the gingival margin to improve the aesthetics of the smile.
Modificació de la posició de les dents a: Modification of the position of the teeth with orthodontic treatment to create a wider smile.
El món avança ràpidament. El coneixement: The world is moving fast. The knowledge and application of this is constantly evolving. Therefore, it would be difficult to compare today's dentistry with what was done 50 years ago, 20 years ago, or even 10 years ago. In this sense, the implementation of “modern” and advanced dentistry brings great benefits to our patients.
Fins fa uns anys l'objectiu principal qu: Until a few years ago, the main objective sought by implantology was to recover the patient's oral function. Today it has become something more elaborate than this, since the aesthetic result or natural integration of the treatment in the patient's mouth / face has reached the same importance as the function. However, it is important that the treatment remains stable over time and that it is durable, which is why it will be very important once the treatment is finished to follow the maintenance instructions and take great care of hygiene.
En moltes ocasions la realització de pro: In many cases the performance of minimally invasive procedures, which require good training and a high degree of specialization, will allow us to achieve these goals more easily, at the same time greatly reducing the patient's post-operative discomfort and the total treatment time. We have shown this in some scientific publications written by Dr. Albert Barroso and published in international magazines.
Estem compromesos en la realització dels: We are committed to carrying out the most effective treatments that cause minimal post-operative discomfort, combined at the same time with constant research work in the field of aesthetic implantology.
Paral.lelament a l'atenció dels pacients: Apart from working in the clinic, Dr. Albert Barroso carries out research related to implantology from which several international scientific publications have been derived. *** Sharing the results of these investigations has been the reason for presentations at both national and international conferences.
A part, imparteix docència a la facultat: In addition, he teaches at the Faculty of Dentistry and in continuing education courses.
*** articles publicats pel Dr. Albert Ba: *** articles published by Dr. Albert Barroso
Molts pacients que abans no es plantejav: Many patients who previously did not consider orthodontic treatment for aesthetic reasons, afraid to show the metallic braces in their smile, now have more options when deciding. First, lingual orthodontics was offered, a complex technique that worked by moving the teeth from inside the palate, thus preventing the orthodontic braces from being seen, but on the other hand causing a lot of discomfort when talking or eating. Currently, invisible orthodontics is another modality that we can offer to our patients who are concerned about appearance or aesthetics during the process. With transparent aligners that fit on the upper and lower teeth, we make the desired dental movements. In addition, when planning the treatment, we can preview the final result before starting.
Cal remarcar que l'ortodòncia no només b: It should be noted that orthodontics not only benefits the patient aesthetically, but also allows for better occlusal stability and therefore better function and long-term health.
En el cas dels nens i preadolescents l'o: In the case of children and pre-adolescents, orthodontics also makes it possible to modify the maxillary and mandibular growth, especially in children who have acquired bad habits such as lingual interposition, finger sucking, oral breathing... This is why it is very important detect these incorrect growth patterns, since treatments at these growth ages allow major changes both at the facial and functional level, which in adulthood can be much more difficult to correct.
L'ús de les noves tecnologies ens permet: The use of new technologies allows us to offer more precise treatments and also greater comfort for patients. We know that some procedures can be more annoying. One of them is the molds we take with silicone pastes to obtain a plaster replica of the teeth. At Clínica Barroso we perform an intraoral scan of the patient. The intraoral scanner is an electronic device that reproduces the structures of the oral cavity with three-dimensional digital images. Using the scanner offers the following benefits:
· Més comoditat pel pacient, ja que s'ev: · More comfort for the patient, avoiding gagging and feeling of suffocation.
· Ens permet ensenyar una imatge real i: · It allows us to show a real, three-dimensional image of the teeth.
· El pacient pot visualitzar els canvis: · The patient can visualize the changes through a virtual prediction of the movements of his teeth.
· Rapidesa a l'hora de realitzar els tra: · Speed when performing the treatments. Since we work with images, we can send them directly via the internet to the laboratory without generating waste and transporting materials.
Alguns pacients no només busquen l'aline: Some patients are not only looking for the alignment of their teeth but also a change in their shape and color, that is, a major change in their smile. In these cases we combine the orthodontic treatment with an aesthetic treatment, which may be dental veneers, aesthetic crowns or a simple teeth whitening at the end of the treatment.
Els laminats són unes làmines que enganx: Veneers are sheets that we attach to the outside of the teeth in order to obtain the aesthetic change we want. Improving the patient's occlusion with orthodontics will  improve the prognosis of the aesthetic treatment, allowing more enamel to be maintained in the dental preparations and reducing the risk of fractures over time.
Recanvi de corones i facetes en mal esta: Replacement of crowns and veneers in poor condition, after orthodontic treatment.
Clínica Barroso compta amb una llarga tr:
Clínica Barroso has a long tradition of dedication to dentistry, solving the oral problems of thousands of patients during its more than 70 years of presence in Girona.

In 1949, Dr Enric Barroso i Baixerias, after completing his studies in dentistry at the University of Madrid, opened the first clinic located at the beginning of Carrer del Carme, next to Plaça Catalunya in Girona. Also for a few years Clínica Barroso treated patients in the municipality of Banyoles.
Després d'una llarga i exitosa trajectòr:
After a long and successful career, the doctor's work activity began to decrease and it is at this moment that the second generation of specialists takes over. After completing his studies in medicine and specializing in stomatology at the University of Barcelona, in 1983 Dr Enric Barroso i Bosch opened new facilities in the center of Girona, specifically in Carrer Cor de Maria. In 2010, with the recent addition to the team of doctors Cristina and Albert Barroso, third generation professionals dedicated to dentistry, it was necessary to move to the modern and spacious facilities located in the Químics district of Girona.

This neighborhood is known historically for the presence of an important Girona factory “Indústrias químicas y tartáricas” (which was in full operation in the 60s and to whom it owes its name), where a large chimney still rises in the exact location where there was the factory originally.
En les noves instal.lacions ubicades a a: In the new facilities located in this neighborhood, at Pujada Creu de Palau 11-13, from 2010 until today, the most advanced technology is available, and what is more important, a highly qualified human team with the highest self-requirement to offer the best solutions to the oral health problems of Girona patients who continue to place their trust in Clínica Barroso.
